translations: （割了庄稼的）一长条田地；一长条；绷带，包装物

sentences.sentence: He clambered into his bunk and rolled himself well up in the blankets, as a swathe of barley is folded into the arms of the reaping machine.
sentences.translation: 河鼠爬进他的床铺，用毯子把自己紧紧裹住，就像一行大麦落进了收割机的怀抱一样。

sentences.sentence: The mountains rose above a swathe of thick cloud.
The combine had cut a swathe around the edge of the field.
sentences.translation: 联合收割机把庄稼绕田边割了一长条。
